title: Large-Scale Online Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of high school-level foundational math concepts and basic computational skills
context.additional_context: Job-seeking individuals' course to cultivate job-specific mathematical application skills. Conducted through twice-weekly online lectures + monthly offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world job-related problems using mathematical modeling with over 80% accuracy.
Learners submit problem-solving strategies incorporating peer feedback from online discussion platforms at least three times.
Learners achieve a 20%+ score improvement in standardized math tests compared to pre-assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
